00020 //
00021 #include "calvin_files/writers/test/CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/CHPQuantificationFileReader.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdater.h"
00025 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationFileWriter.h"

00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_data;
00031 
00032 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest );
00033 
00034 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.quantificationupdater_test"
00035 
00036 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::setUp()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceFile()
00041 {
00042         CHPQuantificationData data(TEST_FILE);
00043         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00044         CHPQuantificationFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationFileWriter(data);
00045         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00046 
00047         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00048         e.name = "1";
00049         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00050         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00051         e.name = "2";
00052         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00053         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00054         e.name = "3";
00055         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00056         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00057         e.name = "4";
00058         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00059         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00060 
00061         delete writer;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::tearDown()
00065 {
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::testQuantification()
00069 {
00070         CreateReferenceFile();
00071 
00072         CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdater upd;
00073         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00074         upd.UpdateQuantification(0, 123.0f);
00075         upd.UpdateQuantification(2, 222.0f);
00076 
00077         CHPQuantificationData data;
00078         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 4);
00082 
00083         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00084         data.GetQuantificationEntry(0, e);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "1");
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 123.0f, 0.000001f);
00087         data.GetQuantificationEntry(1, e);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "2");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 20.0f, 0.000001f);
00090         data.GetQuantificationEntry(2, e);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "3");
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 222.0f, 0.000001f);
00093         data.GetQuantificationEntry(3, e);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "4");
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 40.0f, 0.000001f);
00096 }
